option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light" tools:context=".activities.MainActivity">
<!-- Toolbar --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="@color/primary" android:elevation="4dp" app:title="@string/main_title" app:titleTextColor="@color/text_white" app:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.MusicStudioRental.Toolbar" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Main Content ScrollView --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/toolbar" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Instrument Image Card --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cardInstrumentImage" style="@style/InstrumentCard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imageInstrument" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="250dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/cd_instrument_image" tools:src="@drawable/guitar" />
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Instrument Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textInstrumentName" style="@style/HeadingText" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardInstrumentImage" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:text="Acoustic Guitar Pro" />
<!-- Rating Bar --> <RatingBar android:id="@+id/ratingBarInstrument" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:numStars="5" android:stepSize="0.5" android:isIndicator="true" android:progressTint="@color/rating_star" style="?android:attr/ratingBarStyleSmall" android:scaleX="1.2" android:scaleY="1.2" android:transformPivotX="0dp" android:transformPivotY="0dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textInstrumentName" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:rating="4.5" />
<!-- Rating Text -->
<!-- Divider 1 -->
<TextView android:id="@+id/textRatingValue" style="@style/BodyText" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="30dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/ratingBarInstrument" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/ratingBarInstrument" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/ratingBarInstrument" app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.166" tools:text="4.5" />
<View android:id="@+id/divider1" style="@style/SectionDivider" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/ratingBarInstrument" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Condition Label --> <TextView android:id="@+id/labelCondition" style="@style/SubheadingText" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_condition" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/divider1" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<!-- Condition Radio Group (Multi-choice attribute) --> <RadioGroup android:id="@+id/radioGroupCondition" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/labelCondition" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/radioExcellent" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/condition_excellent" android:enabled="false" android:checked="true" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/radioGood" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/condition_good" android:enabled="false" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/radioFair" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/condition_fair" android:enabled="false" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" />
</RadioGroup>
<!-- Divider 2 --> <View android:id="@+id/divider2" style="@style/SectionDivider" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/radioGroupCondition" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Price --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textPrice" style="@style/PriceText" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:drawablePadding="8dp" app:drawableStartCompat="@drawable/cash" app:drawableTint="@color/accent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/divider2" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:text="50 credits/month" />
<!-- Description --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textDescription" style="@style/BodyText" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textPrice" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:text="Professional 6-string acoustic guitar with solid spruce top. Perfect for studio recording and live performance." />
<!-- Booking Status --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textBookingStatus" style="@style/StatusAvailable" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:textSize="16sp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textDescription" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:text="Status: ✅ Available" />
<!-- Divider 3 --> <View android:id="@+id/divider3" style="@style/SectionDivider" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textBookingStatus" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Navigation Container --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutNavigation" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/divider3" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<!-- Previous Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/buttonPrevious" style="@style/NavigationButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/button_previous" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_media_previous" android:drawablePadding="4dp" android:contentDescription="@string/cd_previous_instrument" />
<!-- Page Indicator --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textPageIndicator" style="@style/CaptionText" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" tools:text="1 / 4" />
<!-- Next Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/buttonNext" style="@style/NavigationButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/button_next" android:drawableEnd="@android:drawable/ic_media_next" android:drawablePadding="4dp" android:contentDescription="@string/cd_next_instrument" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Borrow Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/buttonBorrow" style="@style/PrimaryButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="@string/button_borrow" android:textSize="18sp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" app:iconGravity="start" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/layoutNavigation" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light" tools:context=".activities.MainActivity">
<!-- Toolbar --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="@color/primary" android:elevation="4dp" app:title="@string/main_title" app:titleTextColor="@color/text_white" app:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.MusicStudioRental.Toolbar" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Main Content ScrollView --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/toolbar" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Instrument Image Card --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/cardInstrumentImage" style="@style/InstrumentCard" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imageInstrument" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="250dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/cd_instrument_image" tools:src="@drawable/guitar" />
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Instrument Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textInstrumentName" style="@style/HeadingText" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardInstrumentImage" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:text="Acoustic Guitar Pro" />
<!-- Rating Bar --> <RatingBar android:id="@+id/ratingBarInstrument" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:numStars="5" android:stepSize="0.5" android:isIndicator="true" android:progressTint="@color/rating_star" style="?android:attr/ratingBarStyleSmall" android:scaleX="1.2" android:scaleY="1.2" android:transformPivotX="0dp" android:transformPivotY="0dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textInstrumentName" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:rating="4.5" />
<!-- Rating Text -->
<!-- Divider 1 -->
<TextView android:id="@+id/textRatingValue" style="@style/BodyText" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="30dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/ratingBarInstrument" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/ratingBarInstrument" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/ratingBarInstrument" app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.166" tools:text="4.5" />
<View android:id="@+id/divider1" style="@style/SectionDivider" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/ratingBarInstrument" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Condition Label --> <TextView android:id="@+id/labelCondition" style="@style/SubheadingText" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_condition" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/divider1" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<!-- Condition Radio Group (Multi-choice attribute) --> <RadioGroup android:id="@+id/radioGroupCondition" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/labelCondition" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/radioExcellent" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/condition_excellent" android:enabled="false" android:checked="true" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/radioGood" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/condition_good" android:enabled="false" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" />
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/radioFair" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/condition_fair" android:enabled="false" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" />
</RadioGroup>
<!-- Divider 2 --> <View android:id="@+id/divider2" style="@style/SectionDivider" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/radioGroupCondition" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Price --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textPrice" style="@style/PriceText" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:drawablePadding="8dp" app:drawableStartCompat="@drawable/cash" app:drawableTint="@color/accent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/divider2" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:text="50 credits/month" />
<!-- Description --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textDescription" style="@style/BodyText" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textPrice" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:text="Professional 6-string acoustic guitar with solid spruce top. Perfect for studio recording and live performance." />
<!-- Booking Status --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textBookingStatus" style="@style/StatusAvailable" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:textSize="16sp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textDescription" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:text="Status: ✅ Available" />
<!-- Divider 3 --> <View android:id="@+id/divider3" style="@style/SectionDivider" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/textBookingStatus" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Navigation Container --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutNavigation" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/divider3" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<!-- Previous Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/buttonPrevious" style="@style/NavigationButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/button_previous" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_media_previous" android:drawablePadding="4dp" android:contentDescription="@string/cd_previous_instrument" />
<!-- Page Indicator --> <TextView android:id="@+id/textPageIndicator" style="@style/CaptionText" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" tools:text="1 / 4" />
<!-- Next Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/buttonNext" style="@style/NavigationButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/button_next" android:drawableEnd="@android:drawable/ic_media_next" android:drawablePadding="4dp" android:contentDescription="@string/cd_next_instrument" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Borrow Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/buttonBorrow" style="@style/PrimaryButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="@string/button_borrow" android:textSize="18sp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_input_add" app:iconGravity="start" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/layoutNavigation" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <!-- App Name --> <string name="app_name">Music Studio Rental</string>
<!-- Main Activity --> <string name="main_title">Available Instruments</string> <string name="button_next">Next</string> <string name="button_previous">Previous</string> <string name="button_borrow">Borrow Now</string> <string name="page_indicator">%1$d / %2$d</string> <string name="credits_per_month">%d credits/month</string>
<!-- Status Messages --> <string name="status_available">✅ Available</string> <string name="status_booked"> Booked by %s</string>
<!-- Booking Activity --> <string name="booking_title">Booking Details</string> <string name="section_customer_info">Customer Information</string> <string name="section_rental_summary">Rental Summary</string>
<!-- Input Fields --> <string name="hint_customer_name">Full Name</string> <string name="hint_contact">Email or Phone Number</string> <string name="label_required">*</string>
<!-- Rental Summary Labels --> <string name="label_monthly_cost">Monthly Cost:</string> <string name="label_available_credits">Available Credits:</string> <string name="label_remaining_credits">Remaining:</string> <string name="credits_value">%d credits</string>
<!-- Buttons --> <string name="button_confirm_booking">Confirm Booking</string> <string name="button_cancel">Cancel</string> <string name="button_save">Save</string>
<!-- Validation Errors --> <string name="error_name_required">Customer name is required</string> <string name="error_contact_required">Contact information is required</string> <string name="error_invalid_contact">Please enter a valid email or 10-digit phone number</string> <string name="error_insufficient_credits">Insufficient credits. You need %1$d credits but only have %2$d</string> <string name="error_already_booked">This instrument is already booked</string>
<!-- Success/Info Messages --> <string name="success_booking">Successfully booked %s!</string> <string name="info_booking_cancelled">Booking cancelled</string> <string name="action_view_details">View</string> <string name="action_undo">Undo</string>
<!-- Instrument Conditions --> <string name="condition_excellent">Excellent</string> <string name="condition_good">Good</string> <string name="condition_fair">Fair</string>
<!-- Accessibility Descriptions --> <string name="cd_instrument_image">Image of %s</string> <string name="cd_rating">Rating: %1$.1f out of 5 stars</string> <string name="cd_next_instrument">View next instrument</string> <string name="cd_previous_instrument">View previous instrument</string>
<!-- Dialog Messages --> <string name="dialog_cancel_booking_title">Cancel Booking?</string> <string name="dialog_cancel_booking_message">Are you sure you want to cancel? Any changes will be lost.</string> <string name="dialog_button_yes">Yes, Cancel</string> <string name="dialog_button_no">No, Continue</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources> <!-- App Name --> <string name="app_name">Music Studio Rental</string>
<!-- Main Activity --> <string name="main_title">Available Instruments</string> <string name="button_next">Next</string> <string name="button_previous">Previous</string> <string name="button_borrow">Borrow Now</string> <string name="page_indicator">%1$d / %2$d</string> <string name="credits_per_month">%d credits/month</string>
<!-- Status Messages --> <string name="status_available">✅ Available</string> <string name="status_booked"> Booked by %s</string>
<!-- Booking Activity --> <string name="booking_title">Booking Details</string> <string name="section_customer_info">Customer Information</string> <string name="section_rental_summary">Rental Summary</string>
<!-- Input Fields --> <string name="hint_customer_name">Full Name</string> <string name="hint_contact">Email or Phone Number</string> <string name="label_required">*</string>
<!-- Rental Summary Labels --> <string name="label_monthly_cost">Monthly Cost:</string> <string name="label_available_credits">Available Credits:</string> <string name="label_remaining_credits">Remaining:</string> <string name="credits_value">%d credits</string>
<!-- Buttons --> <string name="button_confirm_booking">Confirm Booking</string> <string name="button_cancel">Cancel</string> <string name="button_save">Save</string>
<!-- Validation Errors --> <string name="error_name_required">Customer name is required</string> <string name="error_contact_required">Contact information is required</string> <string name="error_invalid_contact">Please enter a valid email or 10-digit phone number</string> <string name="error_insufficient_credits">Insufficient credits. You need %1$d credits but only have %2$d</string> <string name="error_already_booked">This instrument is already booked</string>
<!-- Success/Info Messages --> <string name="success_booking">Successfully booked %s!</string> <string name="info_booking_cancelled">Booking cancelled</string> <string name="action_view_details">View</string> <string name="action_undo">Undo</string>
<!-- Instrument Conditions --> <string name="condition_excellent">Excellent</string> <string name="condition_good">Good</string> <string name="condition_fair">Fair</string> <!-- Label used in activity_main --> <string name="label_condition">Condition:</string>
<!-- Accessibility Descriptions --> <string name="cd_instrument_image">Image of %s</string> <string name="cd_rating">Rating: %1$.1f out of 5 stars</string> <string name="cd_next_instrument">View next instrument</string> <string name="cd_previous_instrument">View previous instrument</string>
<!-- Dialog Messages --> <string name="dialog_cancel_booking_title">Cancel Booking?</string> <string name="dialog_cancel_booking_message">Are you sure you want to cancel? Any changes will be lost.</string> <string name="dialog_button_yes">Yes, Cancel</string> <string name="dialog_button_no">No, Continue</string> </resources>
